author: Sally Beck And Sara Malm For The Mail On Sunday
title: ‘Human miracles’ whose bodies remain a mystery to doctors | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Could learning the Iceman's mind tricks make us all immune to arthritis? The ‘human miracles’ whose bodies remain a mystery to doctors Incredible Medicine meets dozens of ‘human miracles’ who have survived crippling diagnoses or whose bodies remain a mystery to doctors Wim Hof claims ability to withstand freezing conditions is down to 'meditation' Scientists hope that by studying his methods they may be able to discover new treatments for diseases such as asthma, rheumatoid arthritis and eczema Published: 22:00 GMT, 25 February 2017 | Updated: 22:01 GMT, 25 February 2017 25 shares
